rationale: This config is a slight variation around the top-performing values for net_dimension and lr_schedule_factor, which had high correlations with performance. It also increases thread_num to potentially benefit from multi-threading.

This config explores a region with higher max_drawdown_penalty and net_dimension, both of which had positive correlations with performance. It also increases ppo_epochs to potentially benefit from more training steps.

This config is a variation around the top-performing values for norm_cash_exp and norm_stocks_exp, both of which had positive correlations with performance. It also decreases min_cash_reserve to potentially reduce risk.
